vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in WALLET.Collect (patch_3.sol#25-33):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_3.sol#28-31)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_3.sol#29)
